name: Meri Sabse Pyaari Hawwa
greetingText: I really am sorry meri jaan!
wishText: Please Forgive Me i genuinely did not know! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! MEOW MEOW...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are meri jaan ki toti, my zindagi <3
outroText: Have fun today, I miss u the most my whole heart <3.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
